name: DORUgamon
description: Dorugamon is a beast-like Digimon with black fur and purple lightning-like stripes on most of its body. It has two large legs and two arms, each of which has three long, red claws, as well as a large, saurian tail. The fur around the base of it neck, on its chest, paws, snout, on the inside of its wings, and the end of its tail is white. It has two pointed ears with purple tips and two large wings. On its brow is a triangular red gem, indicated to be an old-style interface.
